tool_description: An API that shows all the latest news about the Steam Deck.
name: Steam Deck API
title: Steam Deck API

api_list.name: Get All Steam Deck News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all news regarding the Valve Steam Deck.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-deck-api.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-deck-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://steam-deck-api.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam-deck-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
